name: Super Pachi-Slot Mahjong
overview: Super Pachi-Slot Mahjong is a slot machine/mahjong compilation that allows players to play either mode from the main menu. The player can unlock high-stakes versions of both games by winning sufficiently at the "normal" level. The game also features a lot of casino bunny suit girls, similar to Nihon Bussan's Super Nichibutsu Mahjong series.
